document.full_text: part of kevin long's job as the hitting coach for the yankees is to build trust, to get his players to buy what he is selling. he has been far more successful doing that than he was at an off-season job in the minors, when he tried to sell yugos in phoenix.
document.title: kevin long's winding road
lines_and_colors: part of kevin long's job as the hitting coach for the yankees is to build trust, to get his players to buy what he is selling. he has been far more successful doing that than he was at an off-season job in the minors, when he tried to sell yugos in phoenix.
